sub_concepts.name: Continental Drift
sub_concepts.definition: The movement of continents across the Earth's surface over time.

sub_concepts.name: Seafloor Spreading
sub_concepts.definition: The process by which new oceanic crust is created at mid-ocean ridges and moves away from the ridge.

sub_concepts.name: Driving Mechanisms
sub_concepts.definition: The forces that drive plate movement, including convection currents in the mantle and the movement of tectonic plates.

sub_concepts.name: Plate Boundaries
sub_concepts.definition: The areas where tectonic plates meet and interact, including convergent, divergent, and transform boundaries.

sub_concepts.name: Hotspots
sub_concepts.definition: Areas where volcanic activity occurs due to the upwelling of hot mantle rock.

sub_concepts.name: Tectonic Plate Interactions
sub_concepts.definition: The ways in which tectonic plates interact and affect each other's motion, including boundary types and plate geometry.
